snippet: National champion Jared McCann, 31, went from exploring the dark corners of New York City to representing the United States at the international yoga asana competition.
abstract: Profile of Jared McCann, who is preparing to represent the United States in the international yoga asana competition Bushnu Charan Ghosh Cup in Los Angeles; McCann embarked on a path to become the 2012 national asana champion when yoga replaced his hard-partying lifestyle in New York City.
lead_paragraph: National champion Jared McCann, 31, went from exploring the dark corners of New York City to representing the United States at the international yoga asana competition.

headline.seo: Jared McCann Went From Partying to National Yoga Champion
headline.main: Twists and Turns Lead to a New Life
headline.print_headline: Twists and Turns Lead to a New Life
